Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: Getting some fluids and electrolytes on board would probably be really good. Powerade zero or pedialyte or similar.   I’m so glad you’re ok <3 Honestly, it sounds like your friends didn’t act much like friends. Which, if they were drunk too I guess isn’t terribly shocking. Still, when someone passes out after drinking and their priority is gossip...sheesh and wtf.
